select PROFITANDLOSS_JY_DETAIL_ID, LOAN_PROFITANDLOSS_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_DETAIL_ID, ITEM_DETAIL_NAME, MONTH_1, MONTH_2, MONTH_3, MONTH_4, MONTH_5, MONTH_6, MONTH_7, MONTH_8, MONTH_9, MONTH_10, MONTH_11, MONTH_12, MONTH_REP from LN_LOAN_PROFITANDLOSS_JY_DETAIL WHERE 1=1
LOAN_PROFITANDLOSS_ID = #loanProfitandlossId#

ITEM_ID = #itemId#
